Title: Crossing the Darkness II
Text:
Layles told you that she believes her father still lives, held captive in the dungeons of Moria. She hopes to find a way inside the terrible place and rescue him.

Meet with Fridli near the fast travel point which is close to the 1st Hall.

Lorniel told you that she had heard from a Hillman named Fridli who was seeking to leave the service of Angmar and might have information that will allow her to gain access to the dungeons of Moria.

Lore: ยง6A tattered scroll, covered in small runes.
display.Name: ยง5Ashen Scroll

CompleteText: You were sent here by the woman from the South. Here...take this scroll. My people are suspicious. I must go at once.
